<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scope of Limning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1215)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 182 <sup>2.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Characters with access to firearms gain access to accessories that can be used with those weapons._

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** attached to firearm (scope)

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The dwarven gunsmiths of Dongun Hold originally created these scopes to help them clear out vermin in underground areas. This scope captures the sound that echoes off a creature hit by the firearm and transforms it into light, illuminating the target for all to see.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157))    **Effect** If your next Strike from the weapon to which the scope is attached hits a creature, the sound of the impact transforms into light, causing the creature to glow until the end of your next turn. A visible creature can't be [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) while they glow. If a creature is [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26), they're concealed while glowing, rather than being [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39). Because the effect requires a solid impact, [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures are unaffected unless the bullet can deal force damage or has the effects of the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
